en.name: Ever Faithful Companions
en.effect: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" or 1 "Dark Magician Girl" from your hand. Once per Duel, while you control a monster whose original name is "Dark Magician" or "Dark Magician Girl", you can add 1 "Dark Magician" or 1 card that mentions it from your Deck to your hand.
